name: chevereto
description: Chevereto is a powerful self-hosted image hosting script that allows drag-and-drop uploads, galleries, albums, and image sharing. It supports multi-user mode, themes, and APIs, and offers both open and paid editions.
features: Image Hosting: Powerful self-hosted image hosting platform. Complete solution.
Drag-and-Drop: Easy upload with drag-and-drop interface. Effortless sharing.
Albums & Galleries: Organize images in albums and galleries. Beautiful presentation.
Multi-User: Support for multiple users with permissions. Shared hosting.
API Access: Programmatic uploads and management. Developer-friendly.
Themes: Customizable appearance with theme support. Branded experience.
Self-Hosted: Complete control over your image hosting. Data ownership.
